ca.horatiu.decanting

Class HighscoresDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.horatiu.decanting.HighscoresDataSource

  • public class HighscoresDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for highscores to store the SQLiteDatabase reference variable.
    Author:
    Horatiu Lazu
